DESCRIPTION: [#800080]Marked Enemies take double damage from the next attack.
Debuffs include: Frail, Weak, Vulnerable, Bleed, Blight, Marked & Confused
At the start of turn if the [#FF7F50]Light meter is +5 or greater gain 1 dexterity, if it is -5 or less gain 1 strength and 1 vulnerable. Each turn, [#FF7F50]Light is reduced by 1.
[#b20000]Bleeding targets lose HP at the end of their turn. Bleed is reduced by 1 after.
Stress is another form of health, at 100 stress the player will become afflicted, at 200 they will suffer a heart attack.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
